edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.beetle.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.beetle.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ant, Beetle, Ladybug, Person

    public abstract class Player
extends Object
    This class provides the base for the "types" of players you are trying to make. Ant, Beetle, Ladybug, Person (and potentially future classes) will extend Person
    Version:
    Fall 2016, CS56, UCSB, Previous quarters
    Author:
    Yuanqi Li, Samarth Goyal, Dennis, Kevin Jih, Justin Nguyen, Alex Kang

    • Method Detail

      • addPart

        public String addPart()
        Add a body part to the player based on the last roll.
        Returns:
        A message indicating what happened.

      • isWin

        public boolean isWin()
        Checks whether the player has all of the necessary body parts to win. Should be called at the end of each turn.
        Returns:
        True if the player wins, false if not.
